module.name: DynamicArray
module.short: It implements a resizable 2d array containing pointers.

element.name: TOnNotifyItem
element.short: Type for event handling

element.name: TOnNotifyItem.Sender
element.short: instance of the TArray that causes the event

element.name: TOnNotifyItem.Col
element.short: The related Col of the event

element.name: TOnNotifyItem.Row
element.short: The related Row of the event

element.name: TOnNotifyItem.Item
element.short: The related Item of the event

element.name: TOnExchangeItem.Sender
element.short: The instance of the TArray that causes the Exchange event

element.name: TArray
element.short: It implements a resizable 2d array.

element.name: TArray.FCols
element.short: It contains the first dimension of the array.

element.name: TArray.FOnDestroyItem
element.short: A user-defined function to be called when an item is destroyed.

element.name: TArray.FOnNewItem
element.short: A user-defined function to be called when a new item is created.

element.name: TArray.Getarr
element.short: Returns the stored item(actually pointer) in array

element.name: TArray.Getarr.Result
element.short: the stored item,pointer.

element.name: TArray.Getarr.Col
element.short: the first dimension of the array.

element.name: TArray.Getarr.Row
element.short: the second dimension of the array.

element.name: TArray.Setarr
element.short: Sets an item in the array [col][row].

element.name: TArray.Setarr.Col
element.short: the first dimension of the array.

element.name: TArray.Setarr.Row
element.short: the second dimension of the array.

element.name: TArray.Setarr.Avalue
element.short: the value to be stored.

element.name: TArray.ClearCol
element.short: Clears the given TList
element.descr: The given TList is assumed to be the COL of the array.

element.name: TArray.ClearCol.L
element.short: Tlist to be cleared.

element.name: TArray.ClearCol.Col
element.short: the first dimension of the array.

element.name: TArray.Aumentar_Rows
element.short: Extends a row to its new size(Rows)

element.name: TArray.Aumentar_Rows.col
element.short: current column

element.name: TArray.Aumentar_Rows.Rows
element.short: new row size

element.name: TArray.Aumentar_Rows.L
element.short: The row to be operated on.

element.name: TArray.DestroyItem
element.short: event handler called when an item is destroyed.

element.name: TArray.DestroyItem.Col
element.short: the column of the destroyed item.

element.name: TArray.DestroyItem.Row
element.short: the row of the destroyed item.

element.name: TArray.DestroyItem.P
element.short: the item itself before it is unlinked.

element.name: TArray.SetLength
element.short: Resizes the array.

element.name: TArray.SetLength.Cols
element.short: new column size

element.name: TArray.SetLength.Rows
element.short: new row size

element.name: TArray.DeleteColRow
element.short: Deletes a column or a row of an array.

element.name: TArray.DeleteColRow.IsColumn
element.short: Do you want to delete a column?

element.name: TArray.DeleteColRow.Index
element.short: index of a row or a column

element.name: TArray.MoveColRow
element.short: Moves a column to another column or a row to another row.

element.name: TArray.MoveColRow.IsColumn
element.short: Do you want to move a column?

element.name: TArray.MoveColRow.FromIndex
element.short: source

element.name: TArray.MoveColRow.ToIndex
element.short: destination

element.name: TArray.ExchangeColRow
element.short: Swaps two rows or two columns.

element.name: TArray.ExchangeColRow.IsColumn
element.short: Do you want to move a column?

element.name: TArray.ExchangeColRow.Index
element.short: index of row or column

element.name: TArray.ExchangeColRow.WithIndex
element.short: index of row or column

element.name: TArray.Clear
element.short: Removes all elements from the array.

element.name: TArray.Arr
element.short: Reads/Writes an element from the array.

element.name: TArray.OnDestroyItem
element.short: User-defined function which is called when an item is destroyed.

element.name: TArray.OnNewItem
element.short: User-defined function which is called when an item is created.
